attributes.action: Make prescriptions for Cystic Fibrosis Patients free in England
attributes.additional_details: Patients with Cystic Fibrosis, which is a life threatening illness that requires long term care and continuous multiple medications, do not recieve free prescriptions in England. For a lot of patients the costs are too high and so they do not get the vital medications and treatments that are required to keep them healthy and functioning. Please sign this petition as we need over 100'000 signatures to prompt a paliamentry debate on this subject and hopefully to get this issue sorted out.
